thread.title: ITV2 premieres a hilarious new trailer for the Almost Impossible Game Show - TV
thread.title_full: ITV2 premieres a hilarious new trailer for the Almost Impossible Game Show - TV News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: ITV2 premieres a hilarious new trailer for the Almost Impossible Game Show - TV
text: The Almost Impossible Game Show has released a dizzying new clip.The series will see ten contestants put up against a selection of tasks described as "swear-bleepingly, bum-bruisingly, face-slappingly tricky".Games include riding a tiny bike at speed along a very narrow beam, shaking Velcro croissants off a Velcro bodysuit, and putting on a pair of trousers while sprinting on a treadmill. The contestants will be given 50 attempts to complete just five of the challenges, which means there will be lots of opportunity for falling over.ITV2 has ordered two series of the show, which will film over the summer before airing the first six 60-minute episodes later this year.The Almost Impossible Game Show will premiere on ITV2 on October 1.
